title: The Simpsons: The Good, the Bart, and the Loki
original_title: The Simpsons: The Good, the Bart, and the Loki
overview: Loki is banished from Asgard once again and must face his toughest opponents yet: the Simpsons and Springfieldâ€™s mightiest heroes. The God of Mischief teams up with Bart Simpson in the ultimate crossover event paying tribute to the Marvel Cinematic Universe of superheroes and villains.
